name: Meerkats & Lasertraps
description:
Larry experimented on a possum. Suddenly a door to his room opens loudly. *Sound of the door opening.*

Jerry appears with an insidious smile. *Everybody hates him because of his stupid pranks.*

- Do you know what I got behind my back, Larry?  - says Jerry intriguingly.

- No, I don't, Jerry. I'm very busy right now. - utters Larry crustily.

- I HAVE LAZZER! - shouts Jerry. He draws a laser from behind his back and points it on the possum.

Possum panics. He jumps on Larry, scratches his face, then gets to Jerry's laser and swallows it. Few silent seconds later, Larry smiles with his scratched face.

- It ends here. Take your animals, Jerry, we're gonna fight. - says he, as he squeezes the possum.

- AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA

(No animals were hurt during this fight and subsequent development of this game)
